languages.text:
Wielder doesn't provoke Attacks of Opportunity and able to move through enemies.
First attack per turn doesn't spend MP and count to attack limit, but deals only 50% damage
Base Armour Property: +10% Dodge and Parry Chance

traits.locale_text:
Wielder doesn't provoke Attacks of Opportunity and able to move through enemies.
First attack per turn doesn't spend MP and count to attack limit, but deals only 50% damage
Base Armour Property: +10% Dodge and Parry Chance

languages.text: The wearer does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and can move through enemies. The wearer's first attack each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g} but deals −50% less damage. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.
languages.original_text: Персонаж не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} и может перемещаться сквозь позиции врагов. Первая атака персонажа за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} не тратит {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и не входит в лимит {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}атак на ход{/g}, но наносит на 50% меньше урона. Базовое свойство: +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The wielder does not provoke attacks of opportunity and can move through enemies. The wielder's first attack in their turn does not spend MP and does not count toward attack limit per turn but deals −50% less damage. Base armour property: +10% dodge and parry.

The wearer does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and can move through enemies. The wearer's first attack each turn does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn but deals −50% less damage. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

The wearer does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and can move through enemies. The wearer's first attack each turn does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn but deals −50% less damage. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

The wearer does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and can move through enemies. The wearer's first attack each turn does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn but deals −50% less damage. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

languages.text: Giyen kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez ve düşmanların bulunduğu hücrelerden geçebilir. Giyen kişinin her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turdaki{/g} ilk saldırısı, {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} harcamaz ve {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}tur başına saldırı{/g} sınırından sayılmaz ancak verdiği hasar %50 azalır. Taban zırh özelliği: +%10 {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g}.
languages.original_text: The wearer does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and can move through enemies. The wearer's first attack each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g} but deals −50% less damage. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Giyen kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez ve düşmanların bulunduğu hücrelerden geçebilir. Giyen kişinin her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turdaki{/g} ilk saldırısı, {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} harcamaz ve {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}tur başına saldırı{/g} sınırından sayılmaz ancak verdiği hasar %50 azalır. Taban zırh özelliği: +%10 {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g}.

Kullanan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez ve düşmanların bulunduğu hücrelerden geçebilir. Kullanan kişinin her turdaki ilk saldırısı, {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} harcamaz ve tur başına saldırı sınırından sayılmaz ancak verdiği hasar %50 azalır. Taban zırh özelliği: +%10 {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g}.

languages.text: El portador no provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} y puede pasar a través de sus enemigos. El primer ataque del portador en cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} no gasta {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y tampoco cuenta para el {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}límite de ataques por turno{/g}, pero inflige un −50 % menos de daño. Propiedad básica de armadura: +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g}.
languages.original_text: The wearer does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and can move through enemies. The wearer's first attack each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g} but deals −50% less damage. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

El primer ataque del portador en cada turno no gasta {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y tampoco cuenta para el límite de ataques por turno, pero inflige un −50 % menos de daño. Propiedad básica de armadura: +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g}.

El portador no provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} y puede pasar a través de sus enemigos. El primer ataque del portador en cada turno no gasta {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y tampoco cuenta para el límite de ataques por turno, pero inflige un −50 % menos de daño. Propiedad básica de armadura: +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g}.

languages.text: 装备者不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}，且移动时可以穿过敌人。 装备者{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}每回合的首次攻击{/g}不消耗{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，也不计入该{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}的攻击上限，但造成的伤害降低50%。 基础护甲特性：+10%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}。
languages.original_text: The wearer does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and can move through enemies. The wearer's first attack each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g} but deals −50% less damage. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 装备者不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}，且移动时可以穿过敌人。 装备者每回合的首次攻击不消耗{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，也不计入该回合的攻击上限，但造成的伤害降低50%。 基础护甲特性：+10%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}。

装备者不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}，且移动时可以穿过敌人。 装备者每回合的首次攻击不消耗{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，也不计入该回合的攻击上限，但造成的伤害降低50%。 基础护甲特性：+10%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}。

languages.text: L'utilisateur ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} et peut traverser les ennemis. À chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, sa première attaque ne consomme pas de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attaques par tour{/g}, mais inflige −50 % de dégâts. Propriété d'armure de base : +10 % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parade{/g}.
languages.original_text: The wearer does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and can move through enemies. The wearer's first attack each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g} but deals −50% less damage. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisateur ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} et peut traverser les ennemis. À chaque tour, sa première attaque ne consomme pas de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'attaques par tour, mais inflige −50 % de dégâts. Propriété d'armure de base : +10 % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parade{/g}.

L'utilisateur ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} et peut traverser les ennemis. À chaque tour, sa première attaque ne consomme pas de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'attaques par tour, mais inflige −50 % de dégâts. Propriété d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de base : +10 % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g}.

L'utilisateur ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} et peut traverser les ennemis. À chaque tour, sa première attaque ne consomme pas de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'attaques par tour, mais inflige −50 % de dégâts. Propriété d'armure de base : +10 % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parade{/g}.

L'utilisateur ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} et peut traverser les ennemis. À chaque tour, sa première attaque ne consomme pas de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'attaques par tour, mais inflige −50 % de dégâts. Propriété d'armure de base : +10 % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parade{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発せず、敵を通り抜けることができる。 使用者の各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の最初の攻撃は、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を消費せず、ターンごとの{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}攻撃制限{/g}にカウントされないが、ダメージが50%減少する。 基本アーマー特性：{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}+10%。
languages.original_text: The wearer does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and can move through enemies. The wearer's first attack each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g} but deals −50% less damage. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者は機会攻撃を誘発せず、敵を通り抜けることができる。 使用者の各ターンの最初の攻撃は、MPを消費せず、ターンごとの攻撃制限にカウントされないが、ダメージが50%減少する。 基本アーマー特性：回避と受け流し+10%。
使用者は機会攻撃を誘発せず、敵を通り抜けることができる。 使用者の各ターンの最初の攻撃は、MPを消費せず、ターンごとの攻撃制限にカウントされないが、ダメージが50%減少する。 基本アーマー特性：回避と受け流し+10%。
使用者は機会攻撃を誘発せず、敵を通り抜けることができる。 使用者の各ターンの最初の攻撃は、MPを消費せず、ターンごとの攻撃制限にカウントされないが、ダメージが50%減少する。 基本アーマー特性：回避と受け流し+10%。

languages.text: Der Träger provoziert keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} und kann sich durch Gegner bewegen. Der erste Angriff des Trägers pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} verbraucht keine {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}, fließt nicht in das {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}Angriffslimit pro Zug{/g} ein, verursacht aber -50 % weniger Schaden. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}.

Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.
